title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Microlearning System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A formative assessment-centered course operated in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply math problem-solving strategies in mobile environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can achieve over 70% scores in formative assessments after completing weekly learning modules.
Learners can revise personalized learning paths at least three times using situation-specific recommendation tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
